objective: This seminar is designed to provide students the discussions about novel research and technologies, improve the co-operative ability as well as technical presentation. Through the course, the speeches will be adopted as a tool of approach. In addition, some interesting topics are also presented by groups of students during the course. The topics selection and discussions between members of groups are required.
